data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marin, Ivan (2007): The coral-associated shrimp genus Pontonides (Caridea, Palaemonidae, Pontoniinae) in Nhatrang Bay, Vietnam, with description of two new species. Zootaxa 1635: 1-21, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.179514
